summary: Completed comprehensive testing of OMNISupply.io Phase 5 features: Products pagination (3+ pages), Services pagination (3+ pages), and Order Management with 5 different statuses. All 45 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend verified with all 5 order statuses displaying correctly with status descriptions, tracking info, and CDN images.
passed_tests: Backend API - All 45 tests passed (21 new + 24 existing)
Products pagination - Page 1, 2, 3 all return products
Products total count - 3M+ products (sufficient for 3+ pages)
Product images from Emergent CDN verified
Services pagination - Page 1, 2, 3 all return services
Service images from Emergent CDN verified
All 5 order statuses present: pending, confirmed, processing, shipped, delivered
Order status descriptions included in all orders
Shipped order has tracking_number (1Z999AA10123456784) and carrier (UPS Ground)
Delivered order has tracking_number, carrier (FedEx Express), and signed_by (J. Smith)
Order items have CDN image URLs
Service search for 'data center', 'maintenance', 'training' returns results
Frontend Order History page displays all 5 orders with correct statuses
Order Status Timeline component shows 5-step progress
Tracking info displayed for shipped/delivered orders
Login flow with demo credentials working
seed_data_creation: Test data created during backend tests with TEST_ prefix for cart items, RFQs, and quotations

mocked_apis.PunchOut transfer: MOCKED - Creates transfer record but doesn't connect to real ERP systems

products_pagination.details: Products API returns 20 products per page, supports pagination (page 1, 2, 3+), total count 3M+

services_pagination.details: Services API returns services per page, supports pagination, IT Services Catalog (14) + Regular Services (30)

order_statuses.details: 5 sample orders with statuses: pending, confirmed, processing, shipped, delivered

order_status_descriptions.details: Each order has status_description explaining current state

tracking_info.details: Shipped orders have tracking_number and carrier. Delivered orders also have signed_by

cdn_images.details: Products and services use Emergent CDN images (static.prod-images.emergentagent.com)

order_status_timeline.details: Frontend displays 5-step timeline: Pending → Confirmed → Processing → Shipped → Delivered

context_for_next_testing_agent: All Phase 5 features tested and working. Products and Services support pagination with 3+ pages. Order History returns 5 sample orders with different statuses (pending, confirmed, processing, shipped, delivered). Each order has status_description. Shipped/delivered orders have tracking_number, carrier, and signed_by info. All images are from Emergent CDN. PunchOut transfer, Repeat Orders, and Bulk Upload are MOCKED.
